title: Ethereal Diamond Vanki Bracelet
materials: Baguette Cut Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting shine and brilliance.
features: Features a central floral motif with a combination of brilliant and baguette-cut diamonds. The openwork design allows light to enhance the diamonds' sparkle. Secure clasp closure for comfortable wear. The 'Vanki' design, a symbol of prosperity and good fortune, is reimagined with a modern aesthetic.
occasions: and formal gatherings. A perfect modern heirloom to be passed down through generations. Suitable for both traditional Telugu ceremonies and contemporary events.
description: Combines the timeless elegance of diamonds with a contemporary design. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting luster. High-quality diamonds provide exceptional brilliance. A modern interpretation of the traditional Vanki design. Represents a blend of heritage and modern style.
